smg.text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
